pages.text: Maids are capable to do a lot of things; here is a (unexhausive) list of them: $(li)By default, maids will find and pick up items, arrows and exp orbs on the nearby ground. You can adjust this behavior in the Maid GUI. $(li) By default, maids always follow owner (master?).

$(li)Right-clicking maids with empty hand while pressing Shift will put maids in Sitting Mode. In this mode, maids will do nothing, even dodging attacks. $(li)Right-clicking maids with empty hand while pressing Shift will let maids dismount if they are riding. $(li)Right-clicking maids with potions and/or golden apples will cause maids to consume them instead.
$(li)Right-clicking maids with empty bottles will let you extract exp orbs being picked up out in the form of Bottle o' Enchantment.
